column5: Hi all,  Was up at a cottage near parry sound for the weekend and MOST of the little lakes / larger lakes are open water... I saw a couple smaller lakes with a small top sheet of ice but open water holes everywhere !  Brutal I wanna ice fish !!
It's so bad around here I had to turn the freezer lower this morning.
We have what I would call slush ice.  One day it's slush, the next day it's ice, slush, ice.  Yuck!
